claim: It's over what was given. The major telecommunications operators of this country have agreed and, following the requests of the SGAE, together with those of the giants of the world of music such as SONY or UNIVERSAL have decided that the time has come to hear their claims and put an end to the discharges of torrents. This will filter all the internet traffic of all users, identify torrent data packets and lock them immediately, also sending a message to the user that the files that try to download are protected by copyright and that in case of reoffending the service could be temporarily or indefinitely cut. The Association of Spanish Internet users promises to wage war in the next few days with hashtags and memes of all kinds, to try to stop this 'flagrant and obvious vulnerability of the constitutional right to download the disk you want and buy it only if the economy allows it'
claims: The major telecommunications operators of this country have agreed and, following the requests of the SGAE, together with those of the giants of the world of music such as SONY or UNIVERSAL have decided that the time has come to hear their claims and put an end to the discharges of torrents.

This will filter all the internet traffic of all users, identify torrent data packets and lock them immediately, also sending a message to the user that the files that try to download are protected by copyright and that in case of reoffending the service could be temporarily or indefinitely cut.

The Association of Spanish Internet users promises to wage war in the next few days with hashtags and memes of all kinds, to try to stop this 'flagrant and obvious vulnerability of the constitutional right to download the disk you want and buy it only if the economy allows it'.
